bilingual.source: She felt a sense of accomplishment at her graduation.
bilingual.target: 她在毕业时感到一种成就感。

bilingual.source: Graduating from university is a major accomplishment.
bilingual.target: 从大学毕业是一个重大的成就。

bilingual.source: Her greatest accomplishment was winning the championship.
bilingual.target: 她最大的成就是赢得了冠军。

bilingual.source: The project was a significant accomplishment for the team.
bilingual.target: 这个项目是团队的重要成就。

bilingual.source: Learning a new language is a rewarding accomplishment.
bilingual.target: 学习一门新语言是一项有意义的成就。

bilingual.source: She felt a sense of accomplishment standing on the mountaintop.
bilingual.target: 她站在山顶上感到一种成就感。

bilingual.source: She felt a sense of accomplishment after finishing the project.
bilingual.target: 完成项目后她感觉到了一种成就感。

bilingual.source: The teacher's praise induces a sense of accomplishment in students.
bilingual.target: 老师的表扬引起了学生的成就感。

bilingual.source: He felt a sense of accomplishment after finishing the marathon.
bilingual.target: 完成马拉松后，他感到了一种成就感。

bilingual.source: His success in the business world is a hard-won accomplishment.
bilingual.target: 他在商界的成功是一个来之不易的成就。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, I am very disappointed that I won't be able to celebrate Howard's accomplishment tonight.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我好失望哦，今晚不能给霍华德庆祝他的成就。

yingyinNormal.en: Raj is celebrating a tremendous accomplishment and you're not even going to be there to support him?
yingyinNormal.zh: 拉杰要庆祝他的惊人成就，而你们甚至都不去支持他。

yingyinNormal.en: A tremendous accomplishment would be if the planetary body he discovered were plummeting toward earth and he exploded it with his mind.
yingyinNormal.zh: 惊人成就应该是如果他发现一个行星体正急速撞向地球，他用意念摧毁了它。

yingyinNormal.en: That's an impressive accomplishment. He's now an inspiration to millions of Americans who know you don't have to be special or even qualified to go into space.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那的确是一项令人赞叹的成就，他现在成功鼓舞了百万美国人，就算你不特别，甚至不够格，也都可以登上外太空。

yingyinNormal.en: It is a small kind of accomplishment, I suppose.
Well, try seeing accomplishment. Is there a difference? John, you haven't focused.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要去尝试看成果。有区别吗？约翰。你还没有集中你的精力。

yingyinNormal.en: And our side, the side of education and accomplishment is the future of civilization!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们这边，是受教育是文明的未来！

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>

examination_example.sentence: If you were in a management or leadership position, when discussing your current role, never take all the credit for <highlight>accomplishments</highlight> or achievements.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你处于管理或领导的位置，当讨论你目前的角色时，千万不要把所有的功劳或成就都归于自己。

examination_example.sentence: Not so much the formal variety one obtains from a university but the informal variety that comes from credible work experience and professional <highlight>accomplishments</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不是指从大学中取得的那种正式资格，而是从可信的工作经验和专业成就中获得的非正式的能力。

examination_example.sentence: The celebration of milestones may prompt staff to be more grateful about their own <highlight>accomplishments</highlight> and privileges.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 里程碑庆祝活动可能促使员工更加感激自己的成就和特权。

数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>

examination_example.sentence: Student tutors feel upset when their teachable agents fail, but happy when these virtual pupils succeed as they derive pride and satisfaction from someone else's <highlight>accomplishment</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当“学生”们失败时，小老师们会感到沮丧。而当“学生”们成功时，他们就会感到欣喜，因为他们从别人的成就中收获了骄傲和满足。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: an activity that a person can do well, typically as a result of study or practice
